labels.name: android
labels.description: Issues that occurs for the android side

labels.name: defect
labels.description: Issue describes a defect that negatively impacts use.

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

labels.name: effort-L
labels.description: Expected to take a sprint for engineering to complete.

labels.name: effort-M
labels.description: Expected to take a week for engineering to complete.

labels.name: effort-S
labels.description: Expected to take less than a week for engineering to complete.

labels.name: effort-XL
labels.description: Expected to take more than a sprint (or unknown) for engineering to complete.

labels.name: effort-XS
labels.description: Expected to take less than a day for engineering to complete.

labels.name: enhancement
labels.description: Issue describes an improvement or addition to the product.

labels.name: iOS
labels.description: Issues that occurs for the iOS side

labels.name: priority-P5
labels.description: Issues marked P5 will not be taken up by Mozilla, but would be accepted if patches are submitted.

labels.name: task
labels.description: Issue describes a task that needs to be completed but is not a defect or enhancement in itself.
